content.en: Iterative Methods: Researchers have developed and studied iterative methods for solving linear systems that are nearly singular. One algorithm, called the transformed minimal residual algorithm (TMRES), is derived from any convergent iterative scheme. Another area of research focuses on using Krylov subspace methods to solve quadratic matrix polynomials and constrained least squares problems. These algorithms have been found to be effective in solving these types of problems.
content.da: Iterative Metoder: Forskere har udviklet og studeret iterative metoder til at løse lineære systemer, der er næsten singulære. En algoritme, kaldet den transformerede minimale residual-algoritme (TMRES), er afledt fra ethvert konvergent iterativt skema. Et andet forskningsområde fokuserer på at bruge Krylov delrumsmetoder til at løse kvadratiske matrixpolynomier og begrænsede mindste kvadraters problemer. Disse algoritmer har vist sig at være effektive til at løse denne type problemer.
